The velocity of the ions passing through the velocity selector is given by $v= rac{E}{B}$.
The radius of the circular motion of the ions emitted from the center aperture $N$ of the magnetic analyzer is $R= rac{R_{1}+R_{2}}{2}$.
From $ rac{mv^{2}}{R}=qvB$, we obtain $ rac{q}{m}= rac{v}{R B}= rac{2E}{(R_{1}+R_{2})B^{2}}$.
